医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
突破性研究确定了儿童 B-ALL 糖皮质激素耐药背后的机制Josep Carreras 白血病研究所 B-ALL 是最常见的儿科癌症，多年来，由于基于糖皮质激素的非常有效的治疗，其 5 年生存率已达到 85% 甚至更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Breakthrough-study-identizes-mechanisms-behind-glucocorticoid-resistance-in-pediatric-B-ALL.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Breakthrough-study-identizes-mechanisms-behind-glucocorticoid-resistance-in-pediatric-B-ALL.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a119a315-2353-4f1e-bd3a-c9b7a1154c17 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 08:22:44 -0400 Breakthrough study identifies mechanisms behind glucocorticoid resistance in pediatric B-ALL
州级胰岛素成本上限对于增加糖尿病患者的胰岛素使用无效在一项史无前例的研究中，由科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学校区领导的一组研究人员评估了州级胰岛素自付费用对各州和付款人以及一段时间内的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/State-level-insulin-cost-caps-in effective-in-increasing-insulin-use-among-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/State-level-insulin-cost-caps-in effective-in-increasing-insulin-use-among-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d70c21f9-3d17-4831-b416-2e6ce37169fb Mon, 05 Aug 2024 07:29:43 -0400 State-level insulin cost caps ineffective in increasing insulin use among diabetes patients
研究强调 2 型糖尿病患者心力衰竭的性别特异性诊断的必要性维也纳医科大学的一项研究调查了 2 型糖尿病患者收缩性心力衰竭诊断中的性别差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Research-highlights-need-for-gender-specific-diagnosis-of-heart-failure-in-type-2-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Research-highlights-need-for-gender-specific-diagnosis-of-heart-failure-in-type-2-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e3457c7-b0b5-4092-b5fb-b299ddff827e Mon, 05 Aug 2024 07:22:34 -0400 Research highlights need for gender-specific diagnosis of heart failure in type 2 diabetes patients
海藻抗氧化剂有望预防帕金森病帕金森病是一种神经退行性疾病，由产生多巴胺的神经元丧失引起，多巴胺是一种参与运动控制和认知功能的神经递质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Seaweed-antioxidants-show-promise-in-preventing-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Seaweed-antioxidants-show-promise-in-preventing-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca03c359-458d-4898-9d65-feaa077ba3f2 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 07:07:09 -0400 Seaweed antioxidants show promise in preventing Parkinson's disease
研究表明前列腺癌护理需要综合心理健康支持南澳大利亚大学的研究人员表示，心理健康筛查必须纳入前列腺癌的常规诊断中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Study-reveals-need-for-integrated-mental-health-support-in-prostate-cancer-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Study-reveals-need-for-integrated-mental-health-support-in-prostate-cancer-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5906a14e-17e6-4100-8f87-50454eb63160 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 06:40:12 -0400 Study reveals need for integrated mental health support in prostate cancer care
哈里斯在加州的医疗保健之战预示着如果她获胜，医院将面临战斗当卡马拉·哈里斯担任加州最高检察官时，她担心医院、医生团体和健康保险公司之间的合并可能会阻碍竞争并导致患者的价格上涨。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Harrise28099-California-health-care-battles-signal-fights-ahead-for-hospitals-if-she-wins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Harrise28099-California-health-care-battles-signal-fights-ahead-for-hospitals-if-she-wins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62e01c67-f1a6-4b2c-b111-a69f0acadcca Mon, 05 Aug 2024 06:30:17 -0400 Harris’ California health care battles signal fights ahead for hospitals if she wins
粘膜 COVID-19 疫苗可预防 SARS-CoV-2 的空气传播粘膜疫苗免疫与肌内疫苗免疫对叙利亚仓鼠中严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 (SARS-CoV-2) 空气传播感染和传播的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Mucosal-COVID-19-vaccine-prevents-airborne-transmission-of-SARS-CoV-2.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Mucosal-COVID-19-vaccine-prevents-airborne-transmission-of-SARS-CoV-2.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa91d80e-7824-4ce5-b790-5f05f10d3e97 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 04:16:00 -0400 Mucosal COVID-19 vaccine prevents airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2
研究发现大麻醇有望减少焦虑和压力植物大麻素大麻醇是否会影响情绪、压力和焦虑，并引起认知或运动障碍的任何相关不利影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Cannabigerol-shows-promise-in-reducing-anxiety-and-stress-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Cannabigerol-shows-promise-in-reducing-anxiety-and-stress-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85bbb441-7531-40f7-9276-ec064bb1b6c5 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 03:45:00 -0400 Cannabigerol shows promise in reducing anxiety and stress, study finds
牛津大学的在线疗法为焦虑和创伤后应激障碍患者带来希望患有精神健康问题的儿童、青少年和成人需要紧急治疗解决方案。尽管去年政府承诺将 NHS 资金的 8.9% 用于精神健康治疗，但建设新设施和培训新员工的渠道将需要数年时间，而且仅靠这些还不足以满足需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/University-of-Oxforde28099s-online-therapies-offer-hope-for-anxiety-and-PTSD-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/University-of-Oxforde28099s-online-therapies-offer-hope-for-anxiety-and-PTSD-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f159446-4da0-4c79-b359-a76202d2a741 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 02:28:00 -0400 University of Oxford’s online therapies offer hope for anxiety and PTSD patients
英国帕金森氏症患者将在 2024 年通过增加体育活动补助金来支持积极生活英国帕金森氏症协会正在提供颇受欢迎的体育活动补助计划，以帮助更多帕金森氏症患者在 2024 年开始锻炼身体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Parkinsone28099s-UK-supports-active-living-with-enhanced-Physical-Activity-Grants-in-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Parkinsone28099s-UK-supports-active-living-with-enhanced-Physical-Activity-Grants-in-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a99bcbaf-8e7c-4de5-af4a-425e0a6be74d Mon, 05 Aug 2024 02:16:00 -0400 Parkinson’s UK supports active living with enhanced Physical Activity Grants in 2024
